meanings.definition: A thin slice of bacon or ham.
meanings.sent1: I cooked a delicious rasher for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The chef served a crispy rasher with the eggs.
meanings.sent3: The rasher sizzled in the pan, tempting my taste buds.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the sizzling rasher filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The rasher was so thin, it almost melted in my mouth.

meanings.sent4: The rasher on the platter disappeared quickly at the party.
